name: Wild Rapids
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Wild Rapids

Experience the extreme thrill of white water rafting in this, the first EVER Kayak experience for the PlayStation.

Use skill, judgement and become utterly fearless as you negotiate the volcanic landscapes of Japan, the alligator infested waters of the US and deadly icebergs in Northern Europe.

Risk your life to become the ultimate Wild Rapids champ either on your own or against the skills of your friends, but remember – once in the water, nothing can stop the raw terror of nature.
